name: Sligo Park Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a 3 night stay in the Sligo Park Hotel , we considered the 3 nights BB with an evening meal included, to be excellent value for money.
reviews.title: Good value midweek break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled solo
reviews.text: The food , at breakfast and dinner was of a high standard, and considering the cost of eating out in local restaurants, the included 4 course dinner on one night was a real treat.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly and the check in and check outs were professionally handled, when we arrived there were a lot of other people checking in , but there was no fuss or delays, just a good service.
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Used the leisure centre during the afternoon the first day and it was a bit crowded ( a wet day with many children to be amused !!) decided to change my time and found before breakfast to be a good time to get the best out of this very good facility.
reviews.title: Do not understand the poor reviews

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: One small point ..someone had left the remains of a chinese take-away outside our ground floor room and it remained there for the duration of our stay ....not really a 4 star sight when we opened our blinds each morning !!!.
reviews.title: Noisy at night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: My party of five including myself, wife, elderly mother, son and partner stayed at the Sligo Park Hotel, dates 3rd - 5th July . We found
reviews.title: nice hotel pity about the loud noise at night in the room corridors

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the hotel to be well located, Rooms were clean and presentable, Food was excellent and staff were very pleasant and very helpful.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel with friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2006, traveled on business
reviews.text: However what was not acceptable was the level of noise experienced along the corridors after Midnight on both nights, Children knocking
reviews.title: Lovely grand country hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: on doors after midnight and running away, Drunken people having very loud arguments in the corridors at 3 and 4 in the morning .This
reviews.title: good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: drunken behaviour caused us lack of sleep for two nights!
reviews.title: Amazing rooms!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We have just returned from a weekend stay at the Sligo Park Hotel. The check in was smooth and after hearing that my youg son was sick on the journery we were offered some water for him. I had pre- reserved dinner for the Sunday and the girl on checkin confirmed this was so.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel with accomodating staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The rooms were perfect and we had a double bed and a single which was perfect for the three of us. The decor was modern and the room was spotlessly clean.
reviews.title: Wouldn't Return

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was hot so we switched off the radiator and opened the windows.
reviews.title: Top class hotel for such a low price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009
reviews.text: On the Sunday evenng we had dinner in the dining room the food was fine, not fantastic but fine. A special mention goes to Arthur who accomodated my young son with a cheese toastie as he did not like anything else.
reviews.title: The staff goes Above and Beyound!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Breakfast was great though could be a bit congested. I would suggest getting rid of the island and make the breakfast area L - shaped and the people would flow better.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel, friendly staff, will be back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: this is my second time staying in the sligo park hotel and i have seen alot of changes
reviews.title: has great potiental

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: especially in the restaurant we decided to eat there just for the thursday night and the food i would give ten out of ten, presented and cooked to perfection everything fresh
reviews.title: Good Basic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: so good that we booked the friday night for dinner as well. The only problem i would have is that the diningrom does need to be revamped very 90s style it does not give that really comfortable feeling when eating
reviews.title: No complaints for the Sligo Park Hotel !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are very nice especially rachael at reception and the restaurant Manager
reviews.title: Great service and friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The bedrooms where very modern and clean,
reviews.title: NOT 4STAR

description: A warm welcome awaits you at the four star Sligo Park Hotel and Leisure Club, a contemporary styled hotel in lush landscaped parkland, one mile from the vibrant town of Sligo. Each bright, modern room is designed with guest comfort in mind. The bar and restaurant serve the best of local ingredients in a relaxed setting popular with locals and guests. There is a superb health and leisure club and complimentary WiFi for guests
